Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.Utility.CTRE

Class PidControllerWrapper

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.Utility.CTRE.PidControllerWrapper
public class PidControllerWrapper extends Object
A wrapper class around Slot0Configs that provides immutable updates for PID constants. Each method in this class returns a new instance with the updated configuration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PidControllerWrapper(Slot0Configs pidSlot0Configs)
    Constructs a PidControllerWrapper with the given Slot0Configs.
